about_the_game:
Forklift is a useful and powerful industrial truck used to lift and move materials over short distances, which is also called lift truck, fork truck, fork hoist and forklift truck. Forklifts have become an indispensable piece of equipment in manufacturing and warehousing.

Up for a real forklift gaming experience? We worked really hard and thoroughly to enable you great forklift simulator realistic graphics in one of the best forklift games.

REAL WAREHOUSE EXPERIENCE Not only that you need to ride the forklift, you need to manually move boxes like in a real warehouse. Be careful in how you manage the forklift, you can cause different problems in this realistic experience.

FULL CONTROL In one of the most best warehouse and logistics simulator, you will have full control over the forklift. That is why we can proudly say that this is one of the best forklift games . All you need to do is show that you have the skills and orientation to ride the forklift.

STUNNING GRAPHICS The graphics is one of the best things and is making this simulator one of the best forklift truck games. If you're looking for a forklift demo game, you'll rarely find a better and more realistic experience.

ENJOY THE FREE RIDE Enjoy the game as one of the best free forklift demo available on VR today.

FEATURES:

– Realistic forklift simulator

– Real warehouse conditions

– Amazing HD graphics

– Great controls over the vehicle Enjoy this real warehouse experience in the stunning forklift.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Meta Quest 2, and Meta Quest 3

short_description: Forklift Driving Simulator VR offers a realistic, immersive forklift experience in an open warehouse environment. Master loading, unloading, and warehouse navigation with advanced physics. Hone your skills and enjoy the ultimate forklift operation simulation.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
